keywords: Mother In Law Son In Law Relationship
plot: Nader ('Peyman Moaadi' )and Simin (Leila Hatami) argue about living abroad. Simin prefers to live abroad to provide better opportunities for their only daughter, Termeh. However, Nader refuses to go because he thinks he must stay in Iran and take care of his father (Ali-Asghar Shahbazi), who suffers from Alzheimers. However, Simin is determined to get a divorce and leave the country with her daughter.   Written by  Amin Davoodi
title: Nader y Simin, una separación
